Author: PTYX#6840
Content: We couldn't handle more than 5 at a time right now

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: A year from now I expect to be able to handle 10 at a time or more once the marketing tools we are working on are ready. Community, marketing, and PR seems to be a huge part of the success of a project so we have to provide solutions within the scope of ICO. If there isn't an ICO involved we can definitely handle 30

Author: Prado#3941
Content: Hi, i'm new to the Komodo community, besides Smart Contracts in the way, i was wondering if there was any plan for CDN, Hardware or Mining rental for blockchains developed with Komodo?, if so, new developers could deploy their solution in minutes and start injecting FIAT to the community of Komodo miners, i think it will make Komodo the most notable equihash coin without removing complete autonomy to the new blockchains created on Komodo. With all the equihash power of ASIC and GPU in the community, renting Sol/h and Gb to developers in a descentralizad manner seems pretty interesting and will make the new blockchains much more cheap to deploy and scale initially, at least until the coin gets enough value to attract miners. If the blockchain gains traction Komodo gains by retaining some of the coins, if not, the solution may still be useful and applied for the final users and will get some FIAT besides dPOW and Trading. In essence all you need to implement this is a balancer structure that redirects miners to different Blockchains accordingly, and the automated payments of course.

Author: Prado#3941
Content: Komodo is the more powerful and flexible Blockchain development platform i have seen but its been opaqued by the easy to use and popularity of NEM, Stellar and others (at least in my initial investigation),  i would love to help with my team to make it happen, pay KMD to deploy in a click the infrastructure rented for your blockchain solution, dPOW makes it maybe the only platform that could make this right now, as renting a couple miners for your solution without dPOW will be dangerous for most DAPPs in an open blockchain. Also it could help automatize almost all the current revenue model of Komodo making the coin even more Liquid.

Author: Prado#3941
Content: If something like this is already in motion, i would love to be a part.

Author: Prado#3941
Content: As komodo attracts more h/s will the rewards would be adjusted to show the current security of the network? Example: if all equihash coins make a hardfork to protect from current ASIC there will be Th/s of ASIC available for komodo,  this could make the external dPOW less necessary and save a lot money in BTC attracting more developers, miners and even other blockchains (as the dPOW would be much more cheap and faster) also it will inject more FIAT as mining (or Holding) wouldn't  be the best option to pay for the dPOW in a competitive scenario like that, also hash power could be rented to protect small chains between dPOWs (injecting even more FIAT from developers, startups and organizations), 10 minutes its a small lapse of time to hit komodo, but its enough to ruin most dAPPs, ICOs or Smart Contracts logics and structure. It will contain all projects in consortium and private or semi private structures forever, removing some of the best properties of owning your own open, exchange capable, minable and personalizable blockchain
